items.title: React Todo App
items.summary: Recently I created a React Todo App, with the functionality of Create, Edit, Delete on each item. I created this app, in order to just practice with React.
items.content_html:
Recently I created a React Todo App, with the functionality of Create, Edit, Delete on each item.

I created this app, in order to just practice with React.

items.title: About Me
items.summary: My name is Damianos Giankakis, and I am a graduate of City College, International Faculty of the University of Sheffield. I am a specialist in Backend Web Development, although I also love to expirement with front-end technologies. I usually write about: I speak Greek, English and…
items.content_html:
My name is Damianos Giankakis, and I am a graduate of City College, International Faculty of the University of Sheffield. I am a specialist in Backend Web Development, although I also love to expirement with front-end technologies.

I usually write about:

  • PHP 7 / Laravel 6
  • JavaScript ES6 / Browser Addons
  • Shell Scripting / Bash
  • React Native

I speak Greek, English and a little bit of Deutch. I live in SKG, Macedonia Greece.
In my spare time I like to go 🏊 or play 🏀.

#!/bin/bash

hello() {
    name=$1
    printf "%s\n" "Hi, $name"
}
hello "guest"
